name: Across the Ages
description:
A clicker with the theme of advancing which is represented by ages across time starting with a time where not even stone is used. You advance by collecting resources by pressing the button in the brackets.

Currently you can only advance to age 2, but there are a thew hidden secrets.

! You can´t save.
! You go to home page by pressing esc.
! Pressing the buttons in the brackets gives Resources.

! You need a number of days and Resources to advance to the next age.

As time goes, we might develop this game thurther, if you like the game, consider Donating.
